乳酸在帮助神经干细胞发育成专门的神经元方面发挥着关键作用东北大学的科学家发现乳酸在帮助神经干细胞发育成特殊神经元（这一过程被称为神经元分化）方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Lactate-plays-a-ritic-role-in-in-helping-neural-stem-cells-develop-into-specialized-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Lactate-plays-a-ritic-role-in-in-helping-neural-stem-cells-develop-into-specialized-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bee9a1b4-994b-4caa-a58b-a1f3e3349db0 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 10:05:56 -0400 Lactate plays a critical role in in helping neural stem cells develop into specialized neurons

膳食 omega-3 脂肪酸可预防与年龄相关的听力损失研究人员报告说，在一项新的基于人群的横断面研究中，Omega-3 脂肪酸二十二碳六烯酸 (DHA) 的血液水平与听力困难呈负相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dietary-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-protect-against-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dietary-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-protect-against-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca68d088-5c12-4fe5-a33a-07e3fe7dac20 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 09:30:44 -0400 Dietary omega-3 fatty acids may protect against age-related hearing loss
